list_definition.definition: something that happens; an incident or occurrence

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: That night a terrible event occurred.

list_definition.definition: an item in a programme of sports etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The long jump was to be the third event of the competition.

list_ex_of_english: Unforeseeable events occurred, the contract was exceeded and re-negotiations were necessary.
What is the causal story behind these events ?
Patients in this sample described two different events leading up to diagnosis.
Semiexperimental evidence consists of reports of similar events that occur repeatedly, but cannot be obtained at will.
Six users related some species to speci®c events in their youth and nine users related some species to an experience in a foreign country.
Which patients talk about stressful life events and social problems to the general practitioner ?
Around a half of the control group reported one or more negative events in the previous 6 months.
Ideally, study of a causal role for life events in depressive disorder would commence around the time of first onset.
